long_description: The boys' Columbia Bonehead Shirt features fly-box chest pockets, a rod holder, tool holder and utility loop to free up young fishermen's hands while they work with lines and lures. Cool cotton shell fabric; polyester mesh lining. Mesh-lined cape vents at the back shoulder keep him cool and comfortable. Rip-and-stick tabs at the collar tips lets him turn the collar up to keep the sun off his neck.
short_description: The boys' Columbia Bonehead Shirt features fly-box chest pockets, a rod holder, tool holder and utility loop to free up young fishermen's hands while they work with lines and lures.
